Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes

Class GatewayApiHttpRouteWrapper

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes.BaseKubernetesObject
us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes.AnnotatedKubernetesObject
us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes.GatewayApiHttpRouteWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
KubernetesObject
public class GatewayApiHttpRouteWrapper extends AnnotatedKubernetesObject
Wrapper class for Kubernetes Gateway API HTTPRoute resources. Provides methods to extract application URLs and specifications from HTTPRoute Kubernetes custom resources.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GatewayApiHttpRouteWrapper

      public GatewayApiHttpRouteWrapper(Boolean onlyAnnotated, String defaultProtocol)
      Constructs a GatewayApiHttpRouteWrapper.
      Parameters:
      onlyAnnotated - whether to filter and process only annotated HTTPRoute resources
      defaultProtocol - the default protocol (e.g., "http" or "https") to use for app URLs

  • Method Details

    • getAppUrl

      protected String getAppUrl(io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.GenericKubernetesResource item)
      Extracts the application URL from the given HTTPRoute resource. Uses the protocol from the resource spec if available; otherwise falls back to the default protocol. Uses the first hostname in the "hostnames" spec field or "localhost" if none are defined.
      Overrides:
      getAppUrl in class AnnotatedKubernetesObject
      Parameters:
      item - the Kubernetes HTTPRoute resource
      Returns:
      the constructed application URL as a String

    • getApplicationSpecs

      public List<ApplicationSpec> getApplicationSpecs(io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClient client, boolean anyNamespace, List<String> matchNames)
      Retrieves a list of ApplicationSpec objects for matching HTTPRoute resources. If the wrapper is configured to only include annotated resources, filters the result accordingly.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationSpecs in interface KubernetesObject
      Overrides:
      getApplicationSpecs in class BaseKubernetesObject
      Parameters:
      client - Kubernetes client to query resources
      anyNamespace - whether to search across all namespaces
      matchNames - list of resource names to match
      Returns:
      filtered or unfiltered list of ApplicationSpec instances
